name: UNDELIVERED (itch)
description:
Play as a postman delivering packages at the end of the world. In this level, it is your goal to do your job and survive the barren world of Undelivered. 

This is a small level design project made for UU level design course that also acts as an MVP capturing the mood and core idea of the game. 

Note: there are some bugs, floating objects and other issues in the game. These stem from version control conflicts.

By:

André Fuladianpour Dahl

Nick A. Spyrakos

Tiger Wen Hao Sun

Jacob Bekele Jansson

Faruk Osmanağaoğlu

Assets used:

Synty Studios - Simple Apocalypse

Synty Studios - Polygon City

Synty Studios - Polygon Farm

Synty Studios - Polygon Adventure

Staggart Creation - Stylized Water Shader
